values: 盖；覆盖；遮盖；包括；涉及；遮掩；掩盖；敷衍；报道；掩护；包庇；占（面积）；顶替；代替；替补；掩蔽；足以支付；给…保险；行走（一段路程）；翻唱；撒上；洒上；溅上
遮盖；遮盖物；覆盖物；掩盖；掩护；掩饰；掩护物；掩蔽物；伪装；盖子；保护罩；套子；床单；罩子；掩蔽处；庇护所；避难所；躲避处；保险；保险范围；保障；书刊的封面；书皮；翻录版本；翻唱版本；隐藏处；隐蔽处；树木植物；自然植被

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 保护；覆盖；掩护；有夫之妇的法律身分

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指可以揭开的如箱盖、坛盖、壶盖等盖子。
泛指所有的遮盖物。包括盖子或书籍、杂志的封面等。

word_group.brief_definition: (为秘密活动)伪装着, 装扮着, 冒名顶替
考虑周全, 面面俱到
匆匆离开隐蔽处, 冲出躲藏处
粉饰污点；防止可预见的指责
地被；地被植物；矮小植物
封面故事；遮人耳目的说法；托词；借口

bilingual.target: 森林覆盖了加拿大近一半的面积。

bilingual.source: Thick clouds cover the top and snow can fall very hard.
bilingual.target: 厚厚的云层覆盖山顶，雪可能会很大。

bilingual.source: These terraces cover tall mountains, often from the bottom to the top.
bilingual.target: 这些梯田覆盖了高山，通常从山脚到山顶。

bilingual.source: Farmers use straw to cover the fields.
The snow will cover the ground by morning.
Cover the table with a plastic sheet.
bilingual.target: 用一张塑料薄片覆盖桌子。

bilingual.source: We need a cloth to cover the table.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一块布来覆盖桌子。

bilingual.source: Please cover your mouth when you sneeze.
bilingual.target: 打喷嚏时请覆盖住你的嘴。

bilingual.source: Use a sterile bandage to cover the wound.
bilingual.target: 使用无菌的绷带覆盖伤口。

bilingual.source: This paster can cover the wound well.
bilingual.target: 这个贴片可以很好地覆盖伤口。

list.abstract: cover（英[ˈkʌvə]，美[ˈkʌvər]），英语单词，作动词为覆盖；涉及；包括，作名词为覆盖物；套子；藏身处。短语搭配有cover up（掩盖）、cover with（覆盖）、cover letter（求职信）。例句为“You may have to cover some distance.（你可能要走一段距离。）” 该单词作及物动词时的近义词为deal with，不及物动词时的近义词为write over，名词时的近义词为envelope，反义词为uncover，复数为covers，第三人称单数为covers，现在分词为covering，过去式为covered，过去分词为covered。

yingyinNormal.en: In Greenland, as in the Antarctic, the glaciers which cover the protruding land are made of fresh water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 格陵兰岛和南极也一样，那儿覆盖在地表的冰川由淡水构成。

yingyinNormal.en: Insurance companies can no longer deny you coverage just because you have a preexisting condition and they now have to cover free preventive care like checkups and mammograms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 保险公司再也不能因为你已有健康问题而拒绝你，现在他们要对像体检和乳房X光检查这样的预防保健项目进行免费覆盖。

yingyinNormal.en: The girl on the cover with her nipples showing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为封面上的辣妹露两点？

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Canton's cover is not because Mr. Kane's song is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 坎顿先生的翻唱不是改编，因为凯恩先生的歌已经在讽刺了。

yingyinNormal.en: Squeeze your legs together and cover the baby's ears.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把你的双腿并拢，别让宝宝听见了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, like "shame" doesn't cover 1,000 different things?
yingyinNormal.zh: 说得好像“耻辱”不能指别的东西一样。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a big concrete swimming pool with a concrete cover.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个有混凝土保护层的大水泥泳池。

yingyinNormal.en: Cover for me. I got work to do and he needs company.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帮我打掩护，他让我陪但我还有工作。

yingyinNormal.en: It dropped in the water and I thought I would just dry it out. Take cover! Okay! Okay! Take cover! Oh, god! Damn this thing!
yingyinNormal.zh: 书掉进了水里，我想着把它烘干。快躲开！好！好！快躲开！天哪！破烂玩意儿！

yingyinNormal.en: No, I had a cover story. I told everyone it was herpes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，我编了借口，我说那是疱疹[性病] 。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, do you mind? We're under cover here. Yeah, no problem.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，我们这是秘密出勤。好，没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: I showed them how to scramble the records, cover their tracks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我告诉他们如何搞乱记录，隐藏踪迹。

yingyinNormal.en: We're on the cover this month, but next month it could be you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们本月上了封面，但下个月就可以是你。

yingyinNormal.en: I drop the seeds on the ground. Then I cover the seeds with earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把这些花籽散在土地上。然后再把花籽盖上。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? What? You don't actually need to cover the window. Why not?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道吗？什么？你不用再掩着窗子了。为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: First, make a little hole. Then I put the seed in and cover it with earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，挖一个小洞。然后我把这颗种子放进去，盖上土。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but she'd rather do a summer cover because she has a movie coming out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有的，但她更想做夏季刊的封面，来配合她新拍的电影。

yingyinNormal.en: We should probably get going. You know, we've got a lot of ground to cover.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我们最好走吧。我们有很多地方要去。

yingyinNormal.en: You put a seed in the ground, cover it in compost, and it grows into a tree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以在土里放一颗种子，然后用堆肥把它盖上。结着它就长成一棵树了。

yingyinNormal.en: We all know the maxim, but it's true."It's not the crime, it's the cover-up."
yingyinNormal.zh: 那句箴言我们都知道，但也是实话，可恶的不是犯罪，而是对罪行的掩盖。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 代班人员; 代替工作
行走; 走过(一段路程)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 恢复；康复；痊愈；重新拥有；重新控制；收回；得到；收回的物品；回收修理
v. 恢复；找回；重获；康复；复原；使（自己、体力或精神）恢复常态；赚回；取得；挽回；弥补
n. 覆盖物；遮蔽物；遮蔽（或覆盖）物的一层
v. 揭开盖子；移开覆盖物；发现；揭露；脱帽

word_family.mean: v. 盖；覆盖；遮盖；处理；涉及；包括；论及；足以支付；够支付；掩盖；掩饰；用枪瞄准；盖打；转录；翻录；模仿演唱；与…交配

sense_info_list.en: deal with a subject by describing or analyzing its most important aspects or events

examination_example.sentence: So even <highlight>covering</highlight> the whole country in livestock farms wouldn't allow us to <highlight>cover</highlight> all our meat and dairy needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以即使覆盖整个国家的畜牧场也无法满足我们包括所有肉类和奶制品的需求。

examination_example.sentence: Surveys can <highlight>cover</highlight> a single large settlement or entire landscapes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 调查可以覆盖单个大型定居点或整个景观。

sense_info_list.en: disguise the sound or fact of something with another sound or action

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Cover</highlight> up their depressions
examination_example.sentence_trans: 掩盖他们的抑郁情绪

sense_info_list.en: put something such as a cloth or lid on top of or in front of something in order to protect or conceal it

examination_example.sentence: Brown added more <highlight>cover</highlight> crops that draw worms and crickets for the chickens to eat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布朗增加了更多的覆盖作物，吸引虫子和蟋蟀给鸡吃。

examination_example.sentence: The overweight are sometimes pictured in the media with their faces <highlight>covered</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 媒体有时会拍到超重者蒙着脸的照片。

sense_info_list.en: investigate, report on, or publish or broadcast pictures of an event

examination_example.sentence: Pyle was famous for <highlight>covering</highlight> the human side of the war.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Pyle以报道战争中人性的一面而闻名。

sense_info_list.en: (of insurance) protect against a liability, loss, or accident involving financial consequences

examination_example.sentence: These are people who may previously have felt the need to get a full-time job that provided insurance in order to <highlight>cover</highlight> themselves and their families.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些人可能先前感到迫切需要找到一份提供保险的全职工作，以能为自己和家人投保。

sense_info_list.en: (of a sum of money) be enough to pay a bill or cost

examination_example.sentence: They make their product free to readers by charging their writers fees to <highlight>cover</highlight> the costs of preparing an article.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通过向作者收取费用来支付准备文章的费用，从而向读者免费提供他们的产品。

sense_info_list.en: take precautionary measures so as to protect oneself against future blame or liability
aim a gun at someone in order to prevent them from moving or escaping
copulate with (a female animal), especially as part of a commercial transaction between the owners of the animals
a thick protective outer part or page of a book or magazine
make a recording of a song or tune that has already been recorded by someone else
physical shelter or protection sought by people in danger

sense_info_list.zh: 代班人员; 代替工作

sense_info_list.en: extend over an area; travel a particular distance
military support given when someone is in danger from or being attacked by an enemy

sense_info_list.zh: 行走; 走过(一段路程)

word_usage.usage:
表示“遮盖、隐藏”时：
cover指用某物遮掩另一物，意在隐藏、保护等。
conceal指有目的、有意识地隐藏某人、某物，或隐瞒真实情感、真相等。
hide指有意地隐藏，也可指无意或偶然地遮掩、藏匿。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 涉及; 包括; 论述

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 恢复；康复；痊愈；重新拥有；重新控制；收回；得到；收回的物品；回收修理
v. 恢复；找回；重获；康复；复原；使（自己、体力或精神）恢复常态；赚回；取得；挽回；弥补
n. 覆盖物；遮蔽物；遮蔽（或覆盖）物的一层
v. 揭开盖子；移开覆盖物；发现；揭露；脱帽
n. 涉及面；探讨范围；媒体报道；防守；承保范围；覆盖地区；覆盖面；可覆盖面积；盯防

word_family.mean: v. 盖；覆盖；遮盖；处理；涉及；包括；论及；足以支付；够支付；掩盖；掩饰；用枪瞄准；盖打；转录；翻录；模仿演唱；与…交配

sense_info_list.en: put something such as a cloth or lid on top of or in front of something in order to protect or conceal it

examination_example.sentence: "More than 21 acres of hard, white casing stones" that originally <highlight>covered</highlight> it were removed long ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 原先覆盖在金字塔上的“超过21英亩的坚硬的白色外壳石头”早就被移走了。

sense_info_list.en: (of a sum of money) be enough to pay a bill or cost

examination_example.sentence: On many occasions, the entrepreneurs reported not paying themselves a wage at all initially in order to <highlight>cover</highlight> salaries and expenses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多情况下，创业者报告称，最初根本没有为自己支付工资，以支付薪水和开支。

sense_info_list.en: deal with a subject by describing or analyzing its most important aspects or events
sense_info_list.zh: 涉及; 包括; 论述

examination_example.sentence: Many schools seem to ignore the advice; and it does not <highlight>cover</highlight> the kind of glamorous, exotic trips, which are becoming increasingly common.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多学校似乎忽视了这些建议; 这并不包括那些迷人的、充满异国情调的旅行，所以这些旅行正变得越来越普遍。

examination_example.sentence: Sadly, the data also showed face-to-face socializing and sports activity had declined over the period <highlight>covered</highlight> by the survey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗憾的是，数据还显示，面对面的社交和体育活动在调查期间有所下降。

examination_example.sentence: King penguins breed on specific isolated islands in the Southern Ocean where there is no ice <highlight>cover</highlight> and easy access to the sea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帝企鹅在南大洋 (Southern Ocean) 中偏远的孤岛上繁殖，那里没有冰雪覆盖，也很容易进出大海。

sense_info_list.en: extend over an area; travel a particular distance
a thick protective outer part or page of a book or magazine
disguise the sound or fact of something with another sound or action

word_usage.usage:
cover作及物动词，表“遮盖, 覆盖”，可用于被动结构。
示例：He was covered in mud.
他浑身是泥。

cover表“覆盖物, 套子”, “封皮”时，为可数名词。
示例：It's a seat cover.
这是一个椅套。

cover表“躲避处, 避难所”时，为不可数名词。
示例：Everyone ran for cover when it started to rain.
雨下起来时，大家都跑着找地方避雨。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 泛指所有的遮盖物。包括盖子或书籍、杂志的封面等。
通常指可以揭开的如箱盖、坛盖、壶盖等盖子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 涉及; 包括; 论述
代班人员; 代替工作

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 恢复；康复；痊愈；重新拥有；重新控制；收回；得到；收回的物品；回收修理
v. 恢复；找回；重获；康复；复原；使（自己、体力或精神）恢复常态；赚回；取得；挽回；弥补
n. 覆盖物；遮蔽物；遮蔽（或覆盖）物的一层
v. 揭开盖子；移开覆盖物；发现；揭露；脱帽
n. 涉及面；探讨范围；媒体报道；防守；承保范围；覆盖地区；覆盖面；可覆盖面积；盯防

word_family.mean: v. 盖；覆盖；遮盖；处理；涉及；包括；论及；足以支付；够支付；掩盖；掩饰；用枪瞄准；盖打；转录；翻录；模仿演唱；与…交配

sense_info_list.en: put something such as a cloth or lid on top of or in front of something in order to protect or conceal it

examination_example.sentence: Now forests <highlight>cover</highlight> 11% of the land, and the government wants to push the proportion to 18% by the 2040s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在森林覆盖了11%的土地，政府希望这一比例到21世纪40年代可以提高至18%。

examination_example.sentence: The road was <highlight>covered</highlight> with spilled gas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 道路被溢出的汽油覆盖。

examination_example.sentence: As solar panels get cheaper, the world is likely to see more skyscrapers <highlight>covered</highlight> in solar panels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着太阳能电池板的价格越来越便宜，全世界可能会有更多的摩天大楼覆盖上太阳能电池板。

sense_info_list.en: deal with a subject by describing or analyzing its most important aspects or events
sense_info_list.zh: 涉及; 包括; 论述

examination_example.sentence: Hmm, isn't that sort of thing usually <highlight>covered</highlight> by insurance?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，那种东西通常不包括保险范围内吗？

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>covers</highlight> more phenomena.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它包括了更多的现象。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>cover</highlight> preventative care for the local residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们包括对当地居民的预防性护理。

sense_info_list.en: a thick protective outer part or page of a book or magazine

examination_example.sentence: Despite these existing recommendations, there is nothing regarding the <highlight>cover</highlight> color.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管有这些现有的建议，依旧没有任何关于封面颜色的。

examination_example.sentence: While there's little innovation when it comes to passport <highlight>cover</highlight> color, the same cannot be said for the pages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然护照封面的颜色没有什么创新，但内页就不一样了。

examination_example.sentence: Why are dark colors chosen for passport <highlight>covers</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么护照封面要选深色?

sense_info_list.en: (of a sum of money) be enough to pay a bill or cost
investigate; report on; or publish or broadcast pictures of an event

sense_info_list.zh: 代班人员; 代替工作

sense_info_list.en: disguise the sound or fact of something with another sound or action

word_usage.usage:
cover表“躲避处, 避难所”时，为不可数名词。
示例：Everyone ran for cover when it started to rain.
雨下起来时，大家都跑着找地方避雨。

cover表“覆盖物, 套子”, “封皮”时，为可数名词。
示例：It's a seat cover.
这是一个椅套。

cover作及物动词，表“遮盖, 覆盖”，可用于被动结构。
示例：He was covered in mud.
他浑身是泥。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 恢复；康复；痊愈；重新拥有；重新控制；收回；得到；收回的物品；回收修理
v. 恢复；找回；重获；康复；复原；使（自己、体力或精神）恢复常态；赚回；取得；挽回；弥补
v. 揭开盖子；移开覆盖物；发现；揭露；脱帽
n. 涉及面；探讨范围；媒体报道；防守；承保范围；覆盖地区；覆盖面；可覆盖面积；盯防

word_family.mean: v. 盖；覆盖；遮盖；处理；涉及；包括；论及；足以支付；够支付；掩盖；掩饰；用枪瞄准；盖打；转录；翻录；模仿演唱；与…交配

examination_example.sentence: Gas will be <highlight>covered</highlight> for each delivery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次送货都会有汽油费。

examination_example.sentence: You may have to <highlight>cover</highlight> some distance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能要走一段距离。

examination_example.sentence: Further up, the weather changes—low clouds envelope the mountainsides, which are <highlight>covered</highlight> with thick grass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再往上走，天气就变了——低云笼罩着山腰，山腰上长满了茂密的草。

examination_example.sentence: First of all, you must wear shoes that <highlight>cover</highlight> your feet in the lab.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，你必须在实验室里穿上能遮盖你的脚的鞋子。

examination_example.sentence: Large outdoor theater with the closest seats under <highlight>cover</highlight> (price difference).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大型户外影院，最近的座位上有遮盖（价格差异）。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 占(面积); 行走; 走过

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 恢复；找回；重获；康复；复原；使（自己、体力或精神）恢复常态；赚回；取得；挽回；弥补
n. 覆盖物；遮蔽物；遮蔽（或覆盖）物的一层
v. 揭开盖子；移开覆盖物；发现；揭露；脱帽
n. 涉及面；探讨范围；媒体报道；防守；承保范围；覆盖地区；覆盖面；可覆盖面积；盯防

word_family.mean: v. 盖；覆盖；遮盖；处理；涉及；包括；论及；足以支付；够支付；掩盖；掩饰；用枪瞄准；盖打；转录；翻录；模仿演唱；与…交配

sense_info_list.en: put something such as a cloth or lid on top of or in front of something in order to protect or conceal it

examination_example.sentence: The field is <highlight>covered</highlight> with snow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 田野被雪覆盖。

examination_example.sentence: You don't <highlight>cover</highlight> your mouth while coughing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你咳嗽时没有捂住嘴。

examination_example.sentence: Then huge trucks came and <highlight>covered</highlight> us with a layer (层) of soil.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后大卡车来了，给我们铺上了一层泥土。

sense_info_list.en: a thick protective outer part or page of a book or magazine

examination_example.sentence: I remembered the saying we learnt in class about not judging (判断) a book by its <highlight>cover</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我记得我们在课堂上学到的一句话：不要以貌取人。

examination_example.sentence: Many people like to sign their name on the inside <highlight>cover</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人喜欢在封面内签上自己的名字。

examination_example.sentence: We can see her name on the <highlight>cover</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以在封面上看到她的名字。

sense_info_list.en: extend over an area; travel a particular distance
sense_info_list.zh: 占(面积); 行走; 走过

examination_example.sentence: Gas cars can <highlight>cover</highlight> a longer distance on a full tank than electric cars on a full charge ．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与充满电的电动汽车相比，加满油的汽油汽车可以行驶更长的距离。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>covers</highlight> 11 countries in North Africa and is over 9 million square kilometers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它覆盖北非11个国家，面积超过900万平方公里。

examination_example.sentence: Tubbat has planted more than 50,000 trees <highlight>covering</highlight> about the size of 133 football fields.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Tubbat 种植了超过五万棵树，覆盖约为133 个足球场大小的面积。

sense_info_list.en: (of a sum of money) be enough to pay a bill or cost

examination_example.sentence: $3.00 to <highlight>cover</highlight> the cost of art paper and pencils
examination_example.sentence_trans: 3美元用于支付美术纸和笔的费用

examination_example.sentence: ￡20 each cannot <highlight>cover</highlight> the cost of the course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人￡20不够支付课程费用。

sense_info_list.en: deal with a subject by describing or analyzing its most important aspects or events

examination_example.sentence: Xu Xiake was on the road all his life and his travel notes <highlight>covered</highlight> as much as his knowledge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 徐霞客一生都在路上，他的游记涵盖了他的知识。

examination_example.sentence: Include the topics you need to <highlight>cover</highlight> for each subject.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括每个主题需要涵盖的主题。

examination_example.sentence: China <highlight>covers</highlight> large areas and has a great population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国地域辽阔，人口众多。

examination_example.sentence: A plastic <highlight>cover</highlight> around the house helps to keep the heat inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 房子周围的塑料膜有助于保持室内的热量。

sense_info_list.en: to report on an event for television, a newspaper, etc.; to show an event on television

examination_example.sentence: This year's Beijing Music Awards will be <highlight>covered</highlight> live on Sunshine TV this Saturday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本周六，阳光电视台将对今年的北京音乐奖进行现场直播。

word_usage.usage:
cover作及物动词，表“遮盖, 覆盖”，如 cover your mouth 捂住嘴；也可用于被动结构。
示例：He was covered in mud.
他浑身是泥。

cover表“覆盖物, 套子”, “封皮”时，为可数名词。
示例：It's a seat cover.
这是一个椅套。

cover表“躲避处, 避难所”时，为不可数名词。
示例：Everyone ran for cover when it started to rain.
雨下起来时，大家都跑着找地方避雨。
